About this Report
We present our first annual ESG report, 
which covers Allegiant Travel Company’s 
environmental, social and governance (ESG) 
performance from January 1, 2021, through 
December 31, 2021, unless otherwise noted. 
This report has been prepared with reference 
to the GRI Standards, and it aligns with the 
Sustainability Accounting Standards Board 
(SASB) Airlines reporting standards.
